abstract: The allegations relate to the takeover of NeuTec by the drug maker Novartis in 2006.
snippet: The allegations relate to the takeover of NeuTec by the drug maker Novartis in 2006.
lead_paragraph: Two lawyers who worked at the London offices of American law firms were charged with insider trading on Tuesday by a British regulator.

headline.main: Three Accused of Insider Trading in Britain
headline.print_headline: Three Accused of Insider Trading in Britain
